projects.description: Created a personalized hockey poster as a secret Santa gift for a teammate in my fraternity.
projects.title: Hockey Poster
projects.content: Did this as a secret santa gift for one of the guys on my fraternity hockey team.

projects.description: A collection of creative graphic design projects I developed while serving on my residence's house council.
projects.title: Orchard Commons
projects.content: I served on my residence's house council in first year and did a lot of neat graphic design projects!

projects.description: A creative journey where I designed engaging events as part of the Science Undergraduate Society at UBC.
projects.title: Science Undergraduate Society

projects.description: Assisted in securing additional funding for the University of Alberta's student-run newspaper, The Gateway.
projects.title: The Gateway

projects.description: This portfolio entry showcases my creative marketing contributions to SUNIA during the 2018/19 year.
projects.title: SUNIA
projects.content: I served as SUNIA's Marketing for our 2018/19 year. Here's some things I made in the role!

projects.description: A creative journey where my logo design inspired the visual identity of the Canadian Student Leadership Conference.
projects.title: The Canadian Student Leadership Conference
projects.content: CSLC is an event I helped organize. At the beginning of the year, we had a logo contest. My submission was used to inspire the final design.

projects.description: In 2019, I designed promotional materials for our high school graduation, including a Snapchat filter and a commemorative pamphlet.
projects.title: McNally, Graduation 2019
projects.content: I created advertising to support funding our high school graduation, a Snapchat filter for our prom, and the pamphlet distributed at commencement.

projects.description: A showcase of logo designs for the McNally Wrestling Club, highlighting creativity and team spirit.
projects.title: McNally, Wrestling Club

projects.description: During my time on the Edmonton Public School Board's Student Senate, I utilized my graphic design skills to create informative brochures aimed at helping students manage their time effectively.
projects.title: Edmonton Public School Board (EPSB), Student Senate
projects.content: In grade 11 and 12 I served on my school board's Student Senate. In grade 11, I did graphic design work for my committee; I created brochures about time management.

projects.description: A creative advertising campaign I developed for a high school student volunteer club, showcasing my design skills and collaboration with a talented friend.
projects.title: McNally, Massive Volunteering (Club)
projects.content:
I assisted managing a student volunteer club in high school. Here's some example advertising I created.

Note that I didn't design this version of the logo; a close friend of mine did!

projects.description: A collection of my graphic design work for various school projects that showcases my creativity and skills.
projects.title: McNally, Miscellaneous Projects
projects.content: I occasionally did graphic design for school projects. Some of them turned out okay!

projects.description: A creative showcase of designs for McNally's Bike-a-thon, an inspiring fundraiser supporting Kids With Cancer.
projects.title: McNally, Bike-a-thon
projects.content: McNally's Bike-a-thon is an annual fundraiser for Kids With Cancer. Here are a couple of designs I made for the initiative and for my team!

projects.description: Organizing the MVPLead junior-high leadership conference and designing the logo was a rewarding experience that showcased my creative skills.
projects.title: McNally, MVPLead
projects.content: MVPLead was a junior-high leadership conference I helped organized in grade 10. I was tasked with creating the logo—here's how it went!

projects.description: This logo design for my school's photography club is my proudest creative achievement to date.
projects.title: McNally, Photography
projects.content: To date, this is probably my favorite thing I've ever designed. I made a logo for my school's photography club.

projects.description: Designed engaging infographics and posters to showcase cultural heritage at the festival.
projects.title: McNally, Heritage Festival
projects.content: I created a infographic for my Heritage Festival booth and posters to be displayed at the other countries.
